name: NurseryRhyme
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nursery rhyme
des:
This is the first ever Nursery Rhymes Skills that is directed towards the Indian audience. It consists of rhymes in both English and Hindi language. As of now every time it play a random nursery rhyme from the library. To start the skill you can say, Alexa, open nursery rhyme.
 
On every week this skill is updated with new rhymes.

List of Nursery Rhymes added till now:
> Ba Ba Black Sheep
> Twinkle Twinkle Little Stars
> Baby Shark
> Twinkle Twinkle Little Stars (Hindi Version)
> Lakdi Ki Kathi (Hindi)
> Nani Teri Morni (Hindi)
> Aalu Kachalu Beta (Hindi)
More rhymes will be added soon...

Disclaimer: This skill contains the content in both English and Hindi language.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
